coreAtributes.name: sleeved tube top
coreAtributes.description: a slashed necked piped crop top with a daringly wide keyhole.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: [Player.name] roughly shoves [npc.namePos] top up and off.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [Npc.name] roughly shoves [Player.namePos] top up and off
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [Npc1.name] roughly shoves [Npc2.namePos] top up and off

replacementText.playerSelf: [Player.name] slides into [player.her] top before adjusting it so it fits [player.her] snugly.
replacementText.playerNPC: [Player.name] slides [Npc.name] into the tube top before guiding [npc.her] [npc.arms] into the sleeves.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: [Player.name] shoves [Npc.name] into the tube top before wrestling [npc.her] [npc.arms] into the sleeves.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [Npc.name] slides into [npc.her] top before adjusting it so it fits [npc.her] snugly.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [Npc.name] slides [Player.name] into the tube top before guiding [player.her] [player.arms] into the sleeves.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [Npc.name] shoves [Player.name] into the tube top before wrestling [player.her] [player.arms] into the sleeves.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [Npc1.name] slides [Npc2.name] into the tube top before guiding [npc2.her] [npc2.arms] into the sleeves.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [Npc1.name] shoves [Npc2.name] into the tube top before wrestling [npc2.her] [npc2.arms] into the sleeves.

replacementText.playerSelf: [Player.name] slips [player.her] top back into place with an elastic snap.
replacementText.playerNPC: [Player.name] pulls [Npc.namePos] top back into place and makes sure it fits nicely.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [Npc.name] slips [npc.her] top back into place with an elastic snap.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [Npc.name] pulls [Player.namePos] top back into place and makes sure it fits nicely
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [Npc1.name] pulls [Npc2.namePos] top back into place and makes sure it fits nicely.
